newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - National City rating raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - National City rating raised.

text.p: --EVEREN Securities Inc said Friday it raised its long-term six-to-18-month investment rating on the stock of National City Corp to outperform from market performer.
--It also increased its 1997 earnings per share estimate by $0.05 to $3.60 for 1997 and set an initial 1998 EPS projection of $4.
--The bank's 1996 Q4 earnings of $0.85 slightly exceeded EVEREN's expectations.
--EVEREN said its price target on the stock is $47 for the six months and $52 for the 18 months.
--National City ended trade on the NYSE at 45-1/4, up 3/8.
